author: Jimmy Dean
message: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
title: Thought of the day

author: George Allen
message: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed because they are determined to.
title: Thought of the day

author: Joseph Roux
message: A fine quotation is a diamond on the finger of a man of wit, and a pebble in the hand of a fool.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bernice Reagon
message: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyse you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
title: Thought of the day
